data.comment: The match is underway. Luton have kicked-off.
The home team replace Joe Mattock with Matt Crooks.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at AESSEAL New York Stadium.
It's Rotherham with the kick-off after the break.
Ruddock Pelly is replacing Joe Morrell for the away team.
In the minute 58, Paul Warne is making the team's second substitution at AESSEAL New York Stadium with George Hirst replacing Michael Smith.
Luton make their second substitution with Kazenga LuaLua replacing Harry Cornick.
Goal! Luton have got their heads in front thanks to a James Collins strike.
In the minute 77, Mikel Miller (Rotherham) has received a first yellow card.
Paul Warne (Rotherham) is making a third substitution, with Freddie Ladapo replacing Florian Jozefzoon.
Tom Lockyer is on a sub for George Moncur for Luton.
That's full-time at AESSEAL New York Stadium. The final score is 0-1.
